alert.note: Alert for Northwest Pinal County; West Pinal County (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 17 at 8:30PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Pinal County through 915 PM MST... At 830 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles southeast of Maricopa, or 12 miles west of Casa Grande. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Casa Grande and Stanfield. This includes the following highways... AZ Interstate 8 between mile markers 150 and 168. AZ Route 347 between mile markers 161 and 170. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Northwest Pinal County; West Pinal County
